channel.title: Compile help
channel.description:
well, when i try to compile it says:
wen i compile it says
the system cannot find the path specified. finished! press any key to continue. .
is that what its ment to say??
this is what is in side if i click edit,
@echo off echo title compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for D %%x in ("%1jdk*") do (set p="%%x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
is that the right compiler or do i need a different one??
if i need to change please reply what i need to put. (i am just checking)
thanks, luke.

item.title: Compile help
item.dc:creator: @Axed Axed
item.description:
@Axed wrote:

Change your jdk version.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile help
item.dc:creator: @Swift1 Swift`
item.description:
@Swift1 wrote:

Try this:

@echo off title Compiler javac *.java pause
If that doesn’t work you don’t have JDK or you haven’t set your environment variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

well, when i try to compile it says:

wen i compile it says

the system cannot find the path specified.
finished!
press any key to continue. .

is that what its ment to say??

this is what is in side if i click edit,

@echo off
echo
title compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for D %%x in ("%1jdk*") do (set p="%%x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

is that the right compiler or do i need a different one??

if i need to change please reply what i need to put.
(i am just checking)

thanks,
luke.

Read full topic
